ValidationRule.description: Based on Theater and Account Type
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( CONTAINS(TEXT( Auto_Renewal_Status_Core__c ), "Included"), OR( NOT(Terr_Theater__c = 'AMERICAS'), OR( CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), 'MSP'), CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), 'Sonian'), CONTAINS(TEXT(Type), 'Distributor') ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This Account is NOT eligible for Auto Renewals. Please clear out the Auto Renewal Status (Core) field.
